title: Gokuaku Ganbo
overview:
Moving from place to place, Kaoru started working the minute she 
graduated from middle high school. By scrimping and saving, today, Kaoru
 finally has 1 million yen in her savings account. Since she understood 
fully what it felt like to be poor, Kaoru lends her money to her 
colleague who is in financial trouble. She finds herself moneyless 
again, and under strange circumstances, she comes to know of someone who
 works for the company "Koshimizu Consultant"... With her indomitable 
spirit, Kaoru claws her way out of her current situation.
